data.name: Def_FFmpegSourceTextBox.Text
data.value:
LoadPlugin("#<pluginpath>VSFilter.dll")
V=FFVideoSource(source="#<source>", track=#<vtrack>, fpsnum=#<fpsnum>, fpsden=#<fpsden>, cache=true, cachefile="#<cachefile>")#<ffpp>#<avifps> A=FFAudioSource(source="#<source>", track=#<atrack>, adjustdelay=-3, cache=true, cachefile="#<cachefile>") AudioDub(V,A) #<channel> #<crop> #<image> ConvertToYV12() #<coloryuv> #<sharpen> #<tweak> #<coloryuv_analyze> #<textsub> #<trim> #<amplifydb> #<supereq>

data.name: Def_ChannelTextBox.Text
Def_MPEG2SourceTextBox.Text
data.value:
LoadPlugin("#<toolspath>dgindex\DGDecode.dll") LoadPlugin("#<pluginpath>VSFilter.dll") LoadPlugin("#<pluginpath>BassAudio.dll") LoadPlugin("#<pluginpath>NicAudio.dll")
V=MPEG2Source("#<d2vsource>") A=#<audiosource> AudioDub(V,A) #<deinterlace> #<delayaudio> #<channel> #<changefps> #<crop> #<image> ConvertToYV12() #<coloryuv> #<sharpen> #<tweak> #<coloryuv_analyze> #<textsub> #<trim> #<amplifydb> #<supereq>

data.name: Def_NicAudioTextBox.Text
data.value:
LoadPlugin("#<pluginpath>NicAudio.dll")
V=Blankclip(length=#<nicsourcelength>, width=8,height=8, fps=#<nicsourcefps>) A=Nic#<nicsourcename>Source("#<source>") AudioDub(V,A) #<channel> #<trim> #<amplifydb> #<supereq>
